channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera Console

item.title: CVE-2021-38927|2024-08-04T01:51:20.879Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 210322.

item.title: CVE-2022-43842|2024-08-03T13:40:06.593Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 239079.

item.title: CVE-2022-43841|2024-08-03T13:40:06.469Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL9 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 239078.

item.title: CVE-2022-43575|2024-08-03T13:32:59.804Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 238645.
